content.rendered:
Health Services Available

Student Health Services provides essential medical services on site. Students are encouraged to see our on-campus provider for evaluation for treatment and/or referral. Appointments are offered by telehealth or in-person. The student health center offers a limited number of same day appointments on a first come serve basis.

Primary Care Essential Services Provided
  • Acute Illnesses
  • Low Acuity urgent care
  • Chronic Illness management and/or monitoring
  • Sexual Health Concerns, Testing, counseling, etc
  • Women’s Health
  • Physicals – pre-employment, well checks, sports, etc
  •  Immunizations – TB test, Tetanus, Flu
  • Laboratory Testing
  • Referrals – obtain evaluation for any referral to a specialist, Orthopedist, Physical Therapy, Dermatology, Endocrinology, etc
  • Problem focused referrals – any medical condition that cannot be managed will be referred to a specialist to assure continuity of appropriate care

     

  • Minor procedures – laceration repair, I&D, etc
